description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Row' that renders a horizontally scrollable row of 'ExerciseCard' components with TV D-pad navigation support. It manages focus state, handles item selection, and integrates custom hooks for navigation logic.

methods.name: Row({ id = 'row', title, items = [], onSelectItem, initialIndex = 0 })
methods.description: A React functional component that displays a horizontally scrollable list of exercise cards with focus and navigation handling.

methods.name: handleCardSelect
methods.description: Handles the selection of an exercise card, invoking the onSelectItem callback if provided.

ctags.name: Row
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Row({ id = 'row', title, items = [], onSelectItem, initialIndex = 0 }) {$/
